member.name: T:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.DEA.PluginBase.IAgentPlugin
member.summary: the interface to be implemented by a CF plugin

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.DEA.PluginBase.IAgentPlugin.ConfigureApplication(Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.DEA.PluginBase.ApplicationVariable[])
member.summary: sets the initial data for an application
member.param: All variables needed to run the application.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.DEA.PluginBase.IAgentPlugin.RecoverApplication(Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.DEA.PluginBase.ApplicationVariable[])
member.summary: recovers a running application
member.remarks: Note that along with all the variables used in the original call to "ConfigureApplication", a "VCAP_APP_PID" value is added to the variables. This is the process id of the lingering process that you are trying to recover.
member.param: All variables needed to run the application.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.DEA.PluginBase.IAgentPlugin.StartApplication
member.summary: starts the application

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.DEA.PluginBase.IAgentPlugin.GetApplicationProcessId
member.summary: reads the ids of the processes currently used by the running app
member.returns: the ids of the processes, as an array

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.DEA.PluginBase.IAgentPlugin.StopApplication
member.summary: shuts down the application

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.Server.DEA.PluginBase.IAgentPlugin.CleanupApplication(System.String)
member.summary: Cleans up an orphan application.
member.param: Path to the root folder of the application
member.remarks: This method needs to make sure that everything is cleaned up. i.e. Kills processes that are not responding and releases any other used resources.
